Aura: Demon's Knot.name: Aura: Demon's Knot
Aura: Demon's Knot.description: You take a –1 status penalty to Will saves.

Aura: Elysian Dew.name: Aura: Elysian Dew
Aura: Elysian Dew.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8vN6vm2fKB4rE86U]{Elysian Dew}

You gain a 10-foot aura that evokes the vitality of Elysium, causing nearby objects to seem more colorful and plants to stand taller. You and any ally that starts its turn in the emanation gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +1 item bonus to saving throws, and a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the start of your or the ally's next turn.

A @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] of flame radiates from the greater searing blade for 1 minute. All weapon and unarmed attacks by you and your allies within the area gain the effect of the flaming property rune.

Aura: Shining Symbol.name: Aura: Shining Symbol
Aura: Shining Symbol.description:
Zapewniana przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Potężny)}

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 5 Hit Points for 1 minute or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Arachnid Harness.name: Efekt: Arachnid Harness
Effect: Arachnid Harness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JG7p7yI12cAPuJ8X]{Arachnid Harness} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NIyJqiW1Wci6gP9m]{Arachnid Harness (Większy)}

You gain a climb Speed equal to half your land Speed and have your limbs free as you climb. If you use all your free limbs to help you Climb, your climb Speed equals your land Speed.

Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.name: Efekt: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalty)
Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description: The targets take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).

Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.name: Efekt: Architect's Pattern Book
Effect: Architect's Pattern Book.description: If your next action is to cast a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.mwPfoYfVGSMAaUec]{Cozy Cabin}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vPWMEyVTreMOoFnm]{Planar Palace}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPDHmmjJiw7PhTYF]{Resplendent Mansion} spell, you add a room to the structure that is up to 10 feet per side per rank of the spell. This room is outfitted with all the accoutrements for a particular type of recreation, determined by you when you cast the spell. Any character who spends at least 1 hour using this recreational facility and then sleeps a full 8 hours inside the location created by the spell is exceptionally well-rested. They regain double the amount of Hit Points they would normally receive for an 8-hour rest, and when they make the next day's preparations, they gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks and Will saves for the next 12 hours.

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Efekt: Aromatic Ammunition
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.

Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.name: Efekt: Ascendant Dragon Spirit
Effect: Ascendant Dragon Spirit.description: Your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 1k6 poison damage and an additional 1k6 void damage.

Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Lotus).name: Efekt: Porywający Rozkwit (Lotos)
Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Lotus).description: Twojego sojusznika otacza blask, a on sam czuje jak z jego wnętrza wypływa poczucie oświeconego pokoju. Sojusznik zyskuje premię statusową +2 do rzutów obronnych Woli przeciw efektom mentalnym. Ta premia wzrasta do +3 przeciw efektom mentalnym.

Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).name: Efekt: Porywający Rozkwit (Magnolia)
Effect: Bewitching Bloom (Magnolia).description: Twój sojusznik wydaje się bardziej czarujący, chociaż nikt nie jest w stanie określić dlaczego. Sojusznik zyskuje premię statusową +1 do testów Dyplomacji na 10 minut. Jeden raz, w swojej następnej turze, sojusznik może spróbować przykuć uwagę celu. Aby to zrobic musi poświęcić 1 akcję (o cechach emocjonalność, mentalność i wzrokowość) aby wybrać istotę, którą widzi i nawiązać z nią kontakt wrokowy w sposób, który widzi również istota. Cel musi zdać rzut obronny @Check[type:will|dc:20] lub staje się @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Zafascynowany} twoim sojusznikiem, do końca następnej tury tego sojusznika. Jeśli cel zda rzut obronny, lub efekt przeminie, cel staje się tymczasowo niepodatny na bycie zafascynowanym przez jakikolwiek porywający rozkwit magnolii na 24 godziny.

Effect: Blast Boots (Major).name: Efekt: Blast Boots (Potężny)
Effect: Blast Boots (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.sK2zEyhxxP6UnhQk]{Blast Boots (Potężny)}

For 1 minute, the major blast boots remain active, allowing you to clumsily fly through the air for the duration. You gain a 30-foot Fly speed for the duration, but any time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Blast Suit.name: Efekt: Blast Suit
Effect: Blast Suit.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GPrjYsQiC3jKdQmO]{Blast Suit}

The blast suit locks together into a rigid bulwark, protecting you from the blast but preventing you from moving from your position under any circumstances. You become immobilized, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex save against area effects, and gain resistance 5 to all damage you would normally take from area effects and scatter splash damage (this doesn't damage the blast suit). These effects persist for as long as the suit remains in the locked position. You can Interact with the suit to unlock it.

Niezaimplementowane Efekty: Resistance to scatter splash damage.

Effect: Blaze.name: Efekt: Blaze

Effect: Deadweight Mutagen (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Wx5WhSNOmeICgHSC]{Deadweight Mutagen (Potężny)}

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you, and to saving throws against effects that attempt to force you to move or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

Effect: Deadweight Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Deadweight Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Deadweight Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qLwwxk1j04rgXSF9]{Deadweight Mutagen (Umiarkowany)}

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Shove or Trip you, and to saving throws against effects that attempt to force you to move or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Drawback You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} condition and can't remove it while under the effects of the mutagen.

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.name: Efekt: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critical Failure)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critic.description: The creature takes a –2 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).name: Efekt: Deadweight Snare (Success)
Effect: Deadweight Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).

Effect: Deck of Destiny.name: Efekt: Deck of Destiny
Effect: Deck of Destiny.description: Choose either weal or woe. With weal (a fortune effect), the triggering creature rolls twice and takes the better result on their check. With woe (a misfortune effect), the triggering creature is forced to roll twice and take the worse result. If the card you drew is related to the check, such as drawing a card from the suit of shields for a Fortitude saving throw or a card from the suit of crowns for a Deception check, the creature is affected further. When choosing weal, the creature gains a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering check. When faced with woe, the triggering creature takes a –4 circumstance penalty to the triggering check

Effect: Delve Scale.name: Efekt: Delve Scale
Effect: Delve Scale.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1PH7kb7ZVSrfQsgD]{Delve Scale}

You gain a burrow Speed of 15 feet and a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{Skok Wzwyż} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Skok w Dal}.

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1).name: Efekt: Demon Dust (Stage 1)
Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).name: Efekt: Demon Dust (Stage 2)
Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks

Effect: Demon's Knot.name: Efekt: Demon's Knot
Effect: Demon's Knot.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks, and your Strikes deal an additional 1k6 spirit damage.

Effect: Demortification Oil.name: Efekt: Demortification Oil
Effect: Demortification Oil.description: Non-incorporeal undead gain a +1 item bonus to Armor Class.

Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor.name: Efekt: Desolation Locket - Armor
Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mOOJwTOxEFYfi9LV]{Desolation Locket}

The desolation locket numbs you to further despair, and you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor (Great.name: Efekt: Desolation Locket - Armor (Większy)
Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor (Great.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WC0MDw9oLnAtLmh5]{Desolation Locket (Większy)}

The desolation locket numbs you to further despair, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against emotion effects.

Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor (Major.name: Efekt: Desolation Locket - Armor (Potężny)
Effect: Desolation Locket - Armor (Major.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3p4fk9pbwDeue1NG]{Desolation Locket (Potężny)}

The desolation locket numbs you to further despair, and you gain a +4 item bonus to saving throws against emotion effects. When you critically fail a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Desolation Locket - Weapon.name: Efekt: Desolation Locket - Weapon
Effect: Desolation Locket - Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mOOJwTOxEFYfi9LV]{Desolation Locket}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WC0MDw9oLnAtLmh5]{Desolation Locket (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.3p4fk9pbwDeue1NG]{Desolation Locket (Potężny)}

After you cast an enchantment spell by activating the locket, you emanate an aura of hopelessness in a 5-foot emanation until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Diplomat's Charcuterie.name: Efekt: Diplomat's Charcuterie
Effect: Diplomat's Charcuterie.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Wywarcie Wrażenia} and Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}.

Effect: Disarm (Success).name: Efekt: Disarm (Success)
Effect: Disarm (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}

You have a weakened grasp on an item. Further attempts to Disarm the item gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and you take a –2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item. You can end the effect by Interacting to change your grip on the item; otherwise, it lasts as long as you hold the item.

Effect: Draft of Stellar Radiance.name: Efekt: Draft of Stellar Radiance
Effect: Draft of Stellar Radiance.description: You emanate a field of bright light with a 20-foot radius (and dim light for another 20 feet, like a torch). You take a –20 penalty to Stealth checks.

Effect: Dragon Turtle Scale.name: Efekt: Dragon Turtle Scale
Effect: Dragon Turtle Scale.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GnXKCkgZQG0UmuHz]{Dragon Turtle Scale}

When you activate the scale, for 1 minute you gain a swim Speed equal to half your land Speed.

Effect: Dragon Turtle Scale (Greater).name: Efekt: Dragon Turtle Scale (Większy)
Effect: Dragon Turtle Scale (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4MfrhRlz4VeYtYVn]{Dragon Turtle Scale (Większy)}

You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).name: Efekt: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Większy)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Greater).description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +3 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).name: Efekt: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Potężny)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +4 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate.name: Efekt: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate.description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +2 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Dragon's Eye Charm.name: Efekt: Dragon's Eye Charm
Effect: Dragon's Eye Charm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.A4BhFOb4iQtJYYKq]{Dragon's Eye Charm}

Choice of:

You can look through the charm to gain Darkvision for as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

You can speak and understand Draconic as long as you Sustain the Activation, to a maximum of 10 minutes.

You gain fire resistance 5.

Effect: Dragonfly Potion.name: Efekt: Dragonfly Potion
Effect: Dragonfly Potion.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed. Additionally, you gain low-light vision and a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks, and you can't be flanked except by creatures higher level than you are (though lower-level creatures can still help their higher-level allies flank). These effects last for 1 minute.

Effect: Dragonscale Amulet.name: Efekt: Dragonscale Amulet
Effect: Dragonscale Amulet.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bTLmJMATrrtq8NuT]{Dragonscale Amulet}

If you take damage of one of these types from a dragon's Breath Weapon, the amulet begins to glow brightly; for the next 10 minutes, your resistance against that type of damage increases to 20.

Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Drakeheart Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WuzLBK78DgIt8SsN]{Drakeheart Mutagen (Większy)}

Implemented effects

  • +6 item bonus to AC
  • Dexterity cap of +2
  • +3 item bonus to Perception checks
  • -1 penalty to Will saves
  • -1 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -1 penalty to all Recall Knowledge checks
  • Gain the Final Surge action

Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Drakeheart Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Lesser).description:

  • Dexterity cap of +2
  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks
  • -1 penalty to Will saves
  • -1 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -1 penalty to all Recall Knowledge checks
  • Gain the Final Surge action

Effect: Drakeheart Mutagen (Major).name: Efekt: Drakeheart Mutagen (Potężny)

  • -1 penalty to Will saves
  • -1 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -1 penalty to all Recall Knowledge checks
  • Gain the Final Surge action

Effect: Drowsy Sun Eye Drops.name: Efekt: Drowsy Sun Eye Drops
Effect: Drowsy Sun Eye Drops.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aUzX848Ygqicy2qs]{Drowsy Sun Eye Drops}

You gain darkvision to a range of 30 feet.

Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xWCdsGSwLLTeX6tQ]{Eagle Eye Elixir (Większy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Lesser).name: Efekt: Eagle Eye Elixir (Mniejszy)
Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Lesser).description:

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +1 item bonus to Perception checks
  • +2 item bonus to Perception checks to find secret doors and traps

Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Major).name: Efekt: Eagle Eye Elixir (Potężny)
Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.kicNrnZz1KjJYRVI]{Eagle Eye Elixir (Potężny)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +3 item bonus to Perception checks
  • +4 item bonus to Perception checks to find secret doors and traps

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Each time you pass within 10 feet of a secret door or trap, the GM automatically rolls a secret check for you to find it.

Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Moderate).name: Efekt: Eagle Eye Elixir (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Eagle Eye Elixir (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.lPcnDlBGz5QwCMYw]{Eagle Eye Elixir (Umiarkowany)}

  • +2 item bonus to Perception checks
  • +3 item bonus to Perception checks to find secret doors and traps

Effect: Earplugs (PFS Guide).name: Efekt: Earplugs (PFS Guide)
Effect: Earplugs (PFS Guide).description:
Grants a +1 item bonus to saves vs. auditory effects and a –2 penalty to perception checks that rely on hearing.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.iYiA6CMR1N2E2Ny2]{Earplugs (PFS Guide)}

Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action).name: Efekt: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action)
Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (2 Action).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.CTiLugp5ptSItEqN]{Ebon Fulcrum Lens}

You're quickened for 1 minute and gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and DCs.

Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Incorporeal).name: Efekt: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Incorporeal)
Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Incorporeal).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.CTiLugp5ptSItEqN]{Ebon Fulcrum Lens}

You gain the incorporeal trait, and are drained 2.

Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction).name: Efekt: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction)
Effect: Ebon Fulcrum Lens (Reaction).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.CTiLugp5ptSItEqN]{Ebon Fulcrum Lens}

For the first 24 hours after you rejuvenate, you gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, saving throws, and DCs.

Effect: Egg Cream Fizz.name: Efekt: Egg Cream Fizz
Effect: Egg Cream Fizz.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5a6pudUj6WG8RITy]{Egg Cream Fizz}

Upon drinking, you feel lighter and more buoyant, gaining a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed. You also gain another effect determined by the drink's syrup, which is chosen when the drink is created.

  • Chocolate You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks to Balance, Maneuver in Flight, and Squeeze.
  • Strawberry You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, Leap, and Swim.
  • Vanilla You can Step into difficult terrain.

Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (Większy)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{Elixir of Life (Większy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r (7d6+18)[healing]]]{7k6+18 Hit Points}

Effect: Elixir of Life (Lesser).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (Mniejszy)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Elixir of Life (Mniejszy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r (3d6+6)[healing]]]{3k6+6 Hit Points}

Effect: Elixir of Life (Major).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (Potężny)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AmxSqEoFhRLMYd1W]{Elixir of Life (Potężny)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r (8d6+21)[healing]]]{8k6+21 Hit Points}

Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (Drobny)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Minor).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hDLbR56Id2OtU318]{Elixir of Life (Drobny)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r 1d6[healing]]]{1k6 Hit Points}

Effect: Elixir of Life (Moderate).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Elixir of Life (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{Elixir of Life (Umiarkowany)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r (5d6+12)[healing]]]{5k6+12 Hit Points}

Effect: Elixir of Life (True).name: Efekt: Elixir of Life (True)
Effect: Elixir of Life (True).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qK964kZz1ALcysOa]{Elixir of Life (True)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Heal [[/r (10d6+27)[healing]]]{10k6+27 Hit Points}

Effect: Elysian Dew.name: Efekt: Elysian Dew
Effect: Elysian Dew.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8vN6vm2fKB4rE86U]{Elysian Dew}

You gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +1 item bonus to saving throws, and a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks.

Effect: Emberheart.name: Efekt: Emberheart
Effect: Emberheart.description: Each ally in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] regains 30 Hit Points and gains a +3 status bonus to Fortitude saves until the end of their next turn.

Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens.name: Efekt: Emerald Fulcrum Lens
Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.IS1P6er2hLyKXAss]{Emerald Fulcrum Lens}

You gain void healing and harm spells gain a +4 status bonus to the Hit Points they restore to you.

Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Thr.name: Efekt: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Throw)
Effect: Emerald Fulcrum Lens (Saving Thr.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.IS1P6er2hLyKXAss]{Emerald Fulcrum Lens}

You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against magic.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid).name: Efekt: Energized Cartridge (Acid)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into acid, dealing acid damage instead of its usual damage as well as @Damage[1d6[persistent,acid]] damage on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold).name: Efekt: Energized Cartridge (Cold)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Cold).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into ice, dealing cold damage instead of its usual damage as well as @Damage[1d6[persistent,cold]] damage on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity.name: Efekt: Energized Cartridge (Electricity)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Electricity.description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into electricity, dealing electricity damage instead of its usual damage as well as @Damage[1d6[persistent,electricity]] damage on a critical hit.

Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire).name: Efekt: Energized Cartridge (Fire)
Effect: Energized Cartridge (Fire).description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into fire, dealing fire damage instead of its usual damage as well as @Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]] damage on a critical hit.

Effect: Energizing Lattice.name: Efekt: Energizing Lattice
Effect: Energizing Lattice.description:
The latticework glows for 1 minute, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet). You can Dismiss this light.

Aktywacja 2 wyobrażenie (force)

Wymagania The energizing lattice is glowing because it negated an enemy's critical hit

Efekt You release the lattice's energy and make a weapon or unarmed attack Strike that deals 6k6 additional force damage. If your Strike fails, but doesn't critically fail, the target still takes half the force damage. The latticework ceases glowing after the Strike.

Effect: Energizing Pill.name: Efekt: Energizing Pill
Effect: Energizing Pill.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to initiative rolls with Perception.

Effect: Energizing Rune.name: Efekt: Energizing Rune
Effect: Energizing Rune.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Qqh586pudsEqITUk]{Energizing}

The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1k8 damage of the triggering type until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Energizing Tea.name: Efekt: Energizing Tea
Effect: Energizing Tea.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Effect: Energy Adaptive.name: Efekt: Energy Adaptive
Effect: Energy Adaptive.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.DAWaXFtevHLUJxHB]{Energy Adaptive}

You gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Energy Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 15 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1k6 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Energy Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 5 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).name: Efekt: Energy Mutagen (Potężny)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Major).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 20 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 2k6 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Energy Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Energy Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Benefit You gain resistance 10 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add 1k4 damage of the attuned energy type.

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity.name: Efekt: Energy Robe of Electricity
Effect: Energy Robe of Electricity.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute. (Defaults to 25)

Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.name: Efekt: Energy Robe of Fire
Effect: Energy Robe of Fire.description: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to Speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.name: Efekt: Enhanced Hearing Aids
Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids.description: You mentally increase the input of your hearing aids. You gain a +1 item bonus to all hearing-based Perception checks for 10 minutes.

Effect: Erraticannon.name: Efekt: Erraticannon
Effect: Erraticannon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XOXUFjBGO6azymyb]{Erraticannon}

Each time you attack with the weapon, roll to determine the damage type of the Strike.

Effect: Erraticannon (Extra).name: Efekt: Erraticannon (Extra)
Effect: Erraticannon (Extra).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XOXUFjBGO6azymyb]{Erraticannon}

The erraticannon deals 1k6 additional damage of a second damage type.

Effect: Euryale (Curse) Card.name: Efekt: Euryale (Curse) Card

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition.name: Efekt: Exsanguinating Ammunition
Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 1 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Exsanguinating Ammunition (Great.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 3 to persistent bleed damage. In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

In addition, the DC of any flat checks to end persistent bleed damage increases from 15 to 17 (from 10 to 12 when receiving particularly effective assistance) for the duration.

Effect: Fire and Iceberg.description: You gain resistance 5 to fire and cold for 1 minute.

Effect: Flask of Fellowship.name: Efekt: Flask of Fellowship
Effect: Flask of Fellowship.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Diplomacy check.

Effect: Force Shield.description:

The shield surrounds you with a bubble of force that protects you from harm, granting you resistance 5 to physical damage.

Effect: Forge Warden.name: Efekt: Forge Warden
Effect: Forge Warden.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NoTUhKkiTY5BQU5T]{Forge Warden}

Effect: Forgefather's Seal.name: Efekt: Forgefather's Seal
Effect: Forgefather's Seal.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jpQcKMmP1I5674P7]{Forgefather's Seal}

While wearing armor etched with a Forgefather's seal, you gain fire resistance 40. You ignore the armor's check penalty and Speed penalty (if any); if the armor is light or medium, increase its item bonus to AC by 1.

Effect: Forgefather's Seal (Stalwart Sac.name: Efekt: Forgefather's Seal (Stalwart Sacrifice)
Effect: Forgefather's Seal (Stalwart Sac.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jpQcKMmP1I5674P7]{Forgefather's Seal}

The chosen creatures also gain a +4 status bonus to AC and saving throws, and fast healing 15.

Effect: Frost Vial (Greater).name: Efekt: Frost Vial (Większy)
Effect: Frost Vial (Greater).description: The creature takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Frost Vial (Lesser).name: Efekt: Frost Vial (Mniejszy)
Effect: Frost Vial (Lesser).description: The creature takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Fury Cocktail (Greater).name: Efekt: Fury Cocktail (Większy)
Effect: Fury Cocktail (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MUL0ABe8h7Ugc1Jt]{Fury Cocktail (Większy)}

Implemented Effects:

  • +4 item bonus to melee attack rolls
  • -1 penalty to AC
  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • Animalistic: choice of Jaw or Claw strike
  • Double: resistance 5 to physical damage
  • Mournful: resistance 10 to void or vitality depending on negative healing
  • Skeptical: +3 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic: size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide: resistance 10 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Effect: Fury Cocktail (Lesser).name: Efekt: Fury Cocktail (Mniejszy)
Effect: Fury Cocktail (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.BeX3ForBrKTQD4T5]{Fury Cocktail (Mniejszy)}

Implemented Effects:

  • +2 item bonus to melee attack rolls
  • -1 penalty to AC
  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • Animalistic: choice of Jaw or Claw strike
  • Double: resistance 1 to physical damage
  • Mournful: resistance 1 to void or vitality depending on negative healing
  • Skeptical: +1 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic: size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide: resistance 1 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Effect: Fury Cocktail (Moderate).name: Efekt: Fury Cocktail (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Fury Cocktail (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JmxKmYQPQmUlauO4]{Fury Cocktail (Umiarkowany)}

Implemented Effects:

  • +3 item bonus to melee attack rolls
  • -1 penalty to AC
  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • Animalistic: choice of Jaw or Claw strike
  • Double: resistance 2 to physical damage
  • Mournful: resistance 5 to void or vitality depending on negative healing
  • Skeptical: +2 item bonus to saves against magic
  • Titanic: size change to Large, Clumsy 1, and change of reach (+5 for Medium and Small, +10 for Tiny)
  • Wyrmhide: resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison.

Effect: Gecko Potion.name: Efekt: Gecko Potion

Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hGw7Q1y2IEXRGAfv]{Gecko Potion}

  • +1 item bonus to Reflex DC against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} attempts

Effect: Ghost Lantern.name: Efekt: Ghost Lantern
Effect: Ghost Lantern.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pZhqdggB36MpDUwh]{Ghost Lantern}

The creature gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune on all its weapons and unarmed attacks.

Effect: Ghost Oil.name: Efekt: Ghost Oil
Effect: Ghost Oil.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.MIP28AmODXgyF2D2]{Ghost Oil}

The selected weapon gains the effects of a ghost touch rune.

Effect: Ghostbane Fulu.name: Efekt: Ghostbane Fulu
Effect: Ghostbane Fulu.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Uzf9hqwec8fY2j4G]{Ghostbane Fulu}

Upon activation, the weapon gains the benefit of the ghost touch property rune against the triggering incorporeal creature for 1 minute.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.name: Efekt: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.v7YHA9UhDgsvQ47Q]{Ghostcaller's Planchette}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, you gain resistance 5 to all physical damage (except ghost touch) until the start of your next turn. Attacks by incorporeal creatures (such as a ghost's ghostly hand) count as ghost touch.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.name: Efekt: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor (Większy)
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.utRZnCD2XI9Q1dWE]{Ghostcaller's Planchette (Większy)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, you gain resistance 10 to all physical damage (except ghost touch) until the start of your next turn. Attacks by incorporeal creatures (such as a ghost's ghostly hand) count as ghost touch.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.name: Efekt: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapon
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.v7YHA9UhDgsvQ47Q]{Ghostcaller's Planchette}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, the affixed weapon gains the effects of the ghost touch property rune until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.name: Efekt: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapon (Większy)
Effect: Ghostcaller's Planchette - Weapo.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.utRZnCD2XI9Q1dWE]{Ghostcaller's Planchette (Większy)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the planchette, the affixed weapon gains the effects of both the ghost touch and greater disrupting property runes until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Ginger Chew.name: Efekt: Ginger Chew
Effect: Ginger Chew.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.uPP678KODkgDy8UO]{Ginger Chew}

A ginger chew lasts for 1 hour and grants you a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against being sickened.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.name: Efekt: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failu.description: The creature takes a –4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowany}, rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).name: Efekt: Glittering Snare (Failure)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a –2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Efekt: Glittering Snare (Success)
Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a –1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.

Effect: Glow Rod.name: Efekt: Glow Rod
Effect: Glow Rod.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.y4WJY8rCbY6d1MET]{Glow Rod}

The rod sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 40 feet).

Effect: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern L.name: Efekt: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern Light)
Effect: Glowing Lantern Fruit (Lantern L.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.INyiWvehFuo8nGaa]{Glowing Lantern Fruit}

The glowing lantern fruit sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet). You can Interact with the glowing lantern fruit to open or close some of its reflective leaves, making the light directional like a bull's-eye lantern or a hooded lantern.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater).name: Efekt: Glue Bomb (Większy)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{Glue Bomb (Większy)}

The target takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Glue Bomb (Mniejszy)}

Effect: Glue Bomb (Major).name: Efekt: Glue Bomb (Potężny)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.BxJNWWvpxacDIsdt]{Glue Bomb (Potężny)}

The target takes a –20-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Glue Bomb (Moderate).name: Efekt: Glue Bomb (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Glue Bomb (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Glue Bomb (Umiarkowany)}

The target takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Goo Grenade.name: Efekt: Goo Grenade
Effect: Goo Grenade.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.t2A5PzInAqmErLzK]{Goo Grenade (Mniejszy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wi97vRj8IXx3wLmZ]{Goo Grenade (Umiarkowany)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SAtG9jrqey2y8EGb]{Goo Grenade (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.W0RWd2E0jkF2ZXhf]{Goo Grenade (Potężny)}

When you hit a creature with a goo grenade, that creature takes persistent acid damage and a circumstance penalty to its Speeds from the clinging goo.

The target can end any penalties, conditions, and persistent damage caused by the bomb by Escaping or spending a total of 3 Interact actions to pry themselves free of the ooze. These Interact actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

Effect: Grasp of Droskar.name: Efekt: Grasp of Droskar
Effect: Grasp of Droskar.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wWXnr3xw5TzDL1M7]{Grasp of Droskar}

You gain a +1 item bonus on all Athletics checks.

Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.name: Efekt: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight
Effect: Greater Codex of Unimpeded Sight.description: You gain a +1 item bonus on your Perception check to Seek or skill check to Recall Knowledge.

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Efekt: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.name: Efekt: Greater Healer's Gel
Effect: Greater Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 15 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Efekt: Greater Potion of Stable Form
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor.name: Efekt: Grim Sandglass - Armor
Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.OjOpj9u1EdEUhKuX]{Grim Sandglass}

Effect: Grim Sandglass - Armor (Greater).description:

You do not need to eat for three days after consuming a grindlegrub steak, and for that duration you gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against fatigue and the drained condition.

Effect: Grit (Stage 1).description:

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Athletics, Crafting, and Performance checks, and a –2 item penalty to Perception checks.

Effect: Grit (Stage 3).name: Efekt: Grit (Stage 3)
Effect: Grit (Stage 3).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vl5dww56cbXo9QnP]{Grit}

Effect: Grudgestone.name: Efekt: Grudgestone
Effect: Grudgestone.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SH0WmAdjIaNN3OiN]{Grudgestone}

Your Strikes with the affixed weapon against the triggering creature gain a +3 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Grudgestone (Greater).name: Efekt: Grudgestone (Większy)
Effect: Grudgestone (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rEev4xrQyMvjz7W7]{Grudgestone (Większy)}

Your Strikes with the affixed weapon against the triggering creature gain a +5 status bonus to damage rolls.

Effect: Guardian Staff.name: Efekt: Guardian Staff
Effect: Guardian Staff.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UQ0h9IVtHla8gWT7]{Guardian Staff}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jIX2T21YvEsRaaqp]{Guardian Staff (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.REvrniIEqBykkWyI]{Guardian Staff (Potężny)}

A ruby-colored plane of force appears like a shield near the ally, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Heartripper Blade.name: Efekt: Heartripper Blade
Effect: Heartripper Blade.description: Strikes with the heartripper blade inflict an additional @Damage[1d6[void]] damage to living creatures.

Effect: Hexing Jar.name: Efekt: Hexing Jar
Effect: Hexing Jar.description: The thing in the hexing jar becomes more energetic — glowing, dancing, rapping on the glass, or some other action appropriate to its appearance. It encourages you until the start of your next turn, granting you and your familiar a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws and a +2 status bonus against mental effects.

Effect: Holy Steam Ball.name: Efekt: Holy Steam Ball
Effect: Holy Steam Ball.description: Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

0.label: Saving vs. Possession or Control Effect from Undead or Fiend

Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern).name: Efekt: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern)
Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Lantern).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and cast bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella).name: Efekt: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella)
Effect: Hongrui's Gratitude (Umbrella).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Survival checks.

Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds).name: Efekt: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds)
Effect: Horn of Exorcism (Sacred Seeds).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xdPU7qrl5hIvaArY]{Horn of Exorcism}

The horn grants you the ghost touch property rune on all of your weapon and unarmed Strikes.

Effect: Hunter's Brooch.name: Efekt: Hunter's Brooch
Effect: Hunter's Brooch.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4ObrlZ5GhCPA2E2s]{Hunter's Brooch}

By touching a weapon you wield to the symbol and uttering a plea for Erastil's steadying hand, you grant that weapon the deadly k12 trait. Against undead, the weapon instead gains the fatal k12 trait. This blessing lasts for 1 minute, until you score a critical hit with the weapon, or until you aren't wielding the weapon.

Effect: Hydra Mutagen.name: Efekt: Hydra Mutagen
Effect: Hydra Mutagen.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.iN4giDBCWlc19Jsc]{Hydra Mutagen}

Benefit You gain all-around vision and a +3 item bonus to all Intelligence- and Wisdom-based skill checks.

Drawback You are clumsy 1.

Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.name: Efekt: Hyldarf's Fang
Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.O7pgJB6M5UqUZ9Qq]{Hyldarf's Fang}

You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight} as well as fire resistance 20.

Effect: Ichthyosis Mutagen.name: Efekt: Ichthyosis Mutagen
Effect: Ichthyosis Mutagen.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.uwVTuejjSLl82jiA]{Ichthyosis Mutagen}

Benefit For 1 minute, you gain fast healing 2 and automatically succeed at flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage.

Drawback You take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves for 1 minute.

Effect: Illuminated Folio.name: Efekt: Illuminated Folio
Effect: Illuminated Folio.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8anSflDImoYUv2UK]{Illuminated Folio}

These summoned creatures appear as living illustrations, granting them resistance to physical damage equal to half their level and weakness 5 to fire and to any ability with the water trait.

Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.name: Efekt: Immolation Clan Pistol
Effect: Immolation Clan Pistol.description: For 1 minute, you look like a flaming corpse. During this time, you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks and the immolation hand cannon becomes a +2 striking flaming hand cannon.

Effect: Impenetrable Scale.name: Efekt: Impenetrable Scale
Effect: Impenetrable Scale.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aLA7pikfeNIAAGLw]{Impenetrable Scale}

Whenever the armor's fortification rune successfully turns a significant foe's critical hit into a normal hit, one of the scales on the armor turns violet. You gain resistance to physical damage equal to the number of violet scales, to a maximum of 8.

At dawn each day, all the violet scales return to normal.

Effect: Impossible Cake.name: Efekt: Impossible Cake
Effect: Impossible Cake.description: For 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).name: Efekt: Impossible Cake (Większy)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Greater).description: For 30 minutes after the meal, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).name: Efekt: Impossible Cake (Potężny)
Effect: Impossible Cake (Major).description: For 1 hour after the meal, you gain a +4 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.

Effect: Improvised Weapon.name: Efekt: Improvised Weapon
Effect: Improvised Weapon.description:
Automatycznie aplikowane efekty:

  • -2 penalty to attack rolls with any weapon with an improvised trait.

Effect: Injigo's Loving Embrace.name: Efekt: Injigo's Loving Embrace
Effect: Injigo's Loving Embrace.description: You gain resistance 5 to mental damage and a +1 item bonus to saving throws against mental effects

Effect: Iron Medallion.name: Efekt: Iron Medallion
Effect: Iron Medallion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ewzJzyJ4Vo9lZKvp]{Iron Medallion}

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering save and other saves against fear.

Effect: Irondust Stew.name: Efekt: Irondust Stew
Effect: Irondust Stew.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hSJWv6aOwlJyKSLs]{Irondust Stew}

You gain 3 resistance to physical damage for 1 minute, but take a –2 item penalty to Acrobatics and Athletics checks during that time.

Effect: Ivory Baton.name: Efekt: Ivory Baton
Effect: Ivory Baton.description: The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).

Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.name: Efekt: Jack's Tattered Cape
Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.

Effect: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light).name: Efekt: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light)
Effect: Jann's Prism (Jann's Light).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.jsTc3wyD0gSdXILQ]{Jann's Prism}

You shed bright light in a 20-foot emanation (and dim light for the next 20 feet). You gain resistance 5 to two damage types.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor.name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Armor
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.0gxqSZhYdOeJhPrp]{Jolt Coil}

You gain resistance 2 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Greater).name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Armor (Większy)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.auEm7vmpG9V8xpAJ]{Jolt Coil (Większy)}

You gain resistance 3 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major).name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Armor (Potężny)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Armor (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TucjFO5NQHvUUc7a]{Jolt Coil (Potężny)}

You gain resistance 5 to electricity.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon.name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Weapon
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.0gxqSZhYdOeJhPrp]{Jolt Coil}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k4 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Greater).name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Większy)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.auEm7vmpG9V8xpAJ]{Jolt Coil (Większy)}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k6 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major).name: Efekt: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Potężny)
Effect: Jolt Coil - Weapon (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TucjFO5NQHvUUc7a]{Jolt Coil (Potężny)}

After you cast an electricity spell by activating the coil, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k8 electricity damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Journeybread (Power).name: Efekt: Journeybread (Power)
Effect: Journeybread (Power).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.7Sm8NhvQcwi84Nsh]{Journeybread (Power)}

In addition to the benefits of journeybread, power journeybread grants you a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, Force Open, and Swim, and to Fortitude saving throws against being sickened.

Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Juggernaut Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TMtQnY6yvIRCpK9v]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Większy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves
  • Gain 30 temporary Hit Points
  • -2 penalty to Will saves
  • -2 penalty to Perception checks
  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls
  • Treat Fortitude success as critical success

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Juggernaut Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.xE0EdDrf734l2fQH]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Mniejszy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves
  • Gain 5 temporary Hit Points
  • -2 penalty to Will saves
  • -2 penalty to Perception checks
  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Major).name: Efekt: Juggernaut Mutagen (Potężny)
Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1kNp6yOS0aZPBPzZ]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Potężny)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +4 item bonus to Fortitude saves
  • Gain 45 temporary Hit Points
  • -2 penalty to Will saves
  • -2 penalty to Perception checks
  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls
  • Treat Fortitude success as critical success
  • Treat Fortitude critical failure as failure

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Juggernaut Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.mj9i9GeQTADByNPZ]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Umiarkowany)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves
  • Gain 10 temporary Hit Points
  • -2 penalty to Will saves
  • -2 penalty to Perception checks
  • -2 penalty to initiative rolls

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor.name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Armor
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zAnxjSoJBggguWFP]{Jyoti's Feather}

You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against death effects and void energy.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Greater.name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Większy)
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Greater.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GtSPUCDpIMUEq9B0]{Jyoti's Feather (Większy)}

You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against death effects and void energy.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Major).name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Potężny)
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Armor (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.y4dGIbK5wGUJTufR]{Jyoti's Feather (Potężny)}

You gain a +4 item bonus to saving throws against death effects and void energy.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon.name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.zAnxjSoJBggguWFP]{Jyoti's Feather}

The weapon has the disrupting rune while the feather is affixed.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Greate.name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Większy)
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Greate.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.GtSPUCDpIMUEq9B0]{Jyoti's Feather (Większy)}

The weapon has the disrupting rune while the feather is affixed.

Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Major).name: Efekt: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Potężny)
Effect: Jyoti's Feather - Weapon (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.y4dGIbK5wGUJTufR]{Jyoti's Feather (Potężny)}

The weapon has the greater disrupting rune while the feather is affixed.

Effect: Kraken's Guard.name: Efekt: Kraken's Guard
Effect: Kraken's Guard.description: When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Athletics check.

Effect: Lastwall Soup.name: Efekt: Lastwall Soup
Effect: Lastwall Soup.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VeCNWhvEr82ZNoSV]{Lastwall Soup}

The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

Effect: Lastwall Soup (Greater).name: Efekt: Lastwall Soup (Większy)
Effect: Lastwall Soup (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.ed8gAxli6Of58kAM]{Lastwall Soup (Większy)}

The creature gains a +4 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead and 10 temporary hit points.

Effect: Lastwall Soup (Improved).name: Efekt: Lastwall Soup (Improved)
Effect: Lastwall Soup (Improved).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VcEd9Bh4q5vQfpLv]{Lastwall Soup (Improved)}

The creature gains a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks and DCs against undead.

Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel.name: Efekt: Lesser Healer's Gel
Effect: Lesser Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 5 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Lightweave Scarf (Armor).name: Efekt: Lightweave Scarf (Armor)
Effect: Lightweave Scarf (Armor).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.dFYEGk1nUlHqQ5qy]{Lightweave Scarf}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hEnITJ2bJVPrqfGG]{Lightweave Scarf (Większy)}

You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against illusions and Deception checks to Create a Diversion.

Effect: Lightweave Scarf (Armor)(Major).name: Efekt: Lightweave Scarf (Armor)(Potężny)
Effect: Lightweave Scarf (Armor)(Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Uk342C6qpSkdjHBb]{Lightweave Scarf (Potężny)}

You gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against illusions and Deception checks to Create a Diversion.

Effect: Longnight Tea.name: Efekt: Longnight Tea
Effect: Longnight Tea.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws against sleep effects.

Effect: Lumber Lord's Axe.name: Efekt: Lumber Lord's Axe
Effect: Lumber Lord's Axe.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QNRa5r2I00YtEoIV]{Lumber Lord's Axe}

The lumber lord's axe's blade transforms into your choice of standard-grade adamantine or standard-grade dawnsilver.

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Efekt: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form
Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater).name: Efekt: Malleable Mixture (Większy)
Effect: Malleable Mixture (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TKOe8epJTCef87Bj]{Malleable Mixture (Większy)}

You gain a +3 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 10 minutes.

Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser).name: Efekt: Malleable Mixture (Mniejszy)
Effect: Malleable Mixture (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.p0TKEjVqYFZmfz6v]{Malleable Mixture (Mniejszy)}

You gain a +2 item bonus to your Fortitude and Reflex DCs against attempts to Grapple, Shove, or Trip you for 1 minute.

Effect: Matsuki's Medicinal Wine.name: Efekt: Matsuki's Medicinal Wine
Effect: Matsuki's Medicinal Wine.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases and poison.

Effect: Merciful Balm.name: Efekt: Merciful Balm
Effect: Merciful Balm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tspcGx4OrZEv2gQX]{Merciful Balm}

The weapon is granted the nonlethal trait for 1 hour.

Effect: Merciful Charm.name: Efekt: Merciful Charm
Effect: Merciful Charm.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.C8kQuf7gqpjEDmib]{Merciful Charm}

The affixed weapon gains the nonlethal trait for the triggering attack and all other attacks.

Effect: Metuak's Pendant.name: Efekt: Metuak's Pendant
Effect: Metuak's Pendant.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to saving throws against mental effects that would make them confused, controlled, frightened, or stupefied.

Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.name: Efekt: Moderate Healer's Gel
Effect: Moderate Healer's Gel.description: Adding this material component to a heal spell bestows an additional 10 temporary Hit Points to one target healed by the spell. These temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Effect: Moon Blossom Tea.name: Efekt: Moon Blossom Tea
Effect: Moon Blossom Tea.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to initiative rolls.

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure).name: Efekt: Mudrock Snare (Failure)
Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).name: Efekt: Mudrock Snare (Success)
Effect: Mudrock Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).

Effect: Nimbus Breath.name: Efekt: Nimbus Breath
Effect: Nimbus Breath.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NLUsrnvQsYK0CYp3]{Nimbus Breath}

You gain resistance 5 to electricity and gain a fly speed equal to your land speed or 20, whichever is higher.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).name: Efekt: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Diplomacy).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.name: Efekt: Nosoi Charm (Większy) (Diplomacy)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Diplomacy.description: You gain a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks to make a request.

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).name: Efekt: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.

Effect: Numbing Tonic (Greater).name: Efekt: Tonik Odrętwiający (Większy)
Effect: Numbing Tonic (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wuVD3kolQaFAEeBK]{Tonik Odrętwiający (Większy)}

Po wypiciu eliksiru, oraz przez 1 minutę na początku każdej swojej tury, zyskujesz 15 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.

Effect: Numbing Tonic (Lesser).name: Efekt: Tonik Odrętwiający (Mniejszy)
Effect: Numbing Tonic (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.7D6ENmL3mRfUOMwf]{Tonik Odrętwiający (Mniejszy)}

Po wypiciu eliksiru, oraz przez 1 minutę na początku każdej swojej tury, zyskujesz 5 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.

Effect: Numbing Tonic (Major).name: Efekt: Tonik Odrętwiający (Potężny)
Effect: Numbing Tonic (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EAgWYY1C4mDRfwqo]{Tonik Odrętwiający (Potężny)}

Po wypiciu eliksiru, oraz przez 1 minutę na początku każdej swojej tury, zyskujesz 20 tymczasowych Punktów Żywotności.

Effect: Numbing Tonic (Minor).name: Efekt: Tonik Odrętwiający (Drobny)
Effect: Numbing Tonic (Minor).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.V35j3JEJMUbuJZNX]{Tonik Odrętwiający (Drobny)}

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Efekt: Prepared Camouflage Suit
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Efekt: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.

0.label: Crafting an Item Appropriate to the Workshop

Effect: Protective Barrier.name: Efekt: Protective Barrier
Effect: Protective Barrier.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.vehicles.Actor.bMgQftCEiSqa1pTk]{Vonthos's Golden Bridge}

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Effect: Pucker Pickle.name: Efekt: Pucker Pickle
Effect: Pucker Pickle.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VnUXcWG4xWGcb7sc]{Pucker Pickle}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to further attacks against the target that allow you to taste it, including attacks like Grappling or Tripping it using your jaws or Swallowing it Whole.

Effect: Qat (Stage 1).name: Efekt: Qat (Stage 1)
Effect: Qat (Stage 1).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JPGOrHeYxjdnUogT]{Qat}

The creature gains a +1 item bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Quicksilver Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.eQDTsetadI8u8Kc0]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Większy)}

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain a +15 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Drawback You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Quicksilver Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5MKBwpE401uz4kNN]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Mniejszy)}

Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain a +5 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Drawback You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Major).name: Efekt: Quicksilver Mutagen (Potężny)
Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4GXzTN6iSDGfYEAi]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Potężny)}

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain a +20 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Drawback You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Quicksilver Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Quicksilver Mutagen (Moderate).description:

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Acrobatics checks, Stealth checks, Thievery checks, Reflex saves, and Dexterity-based attack rolls, and you gain a +10 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Drawback You take damage equal to twice your level; you can't recover Hit Points lost this way by any means while the mutagen lasts. You take a –2 penalty to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Efekt: Wzniesienie Tarczy
Effect: Raise a Shield.description: Ustawiasz tarczę tak, aby zapewniała ci ochronę. Kiedy masz Wzniesioną Tarczę otrzymujesz jej premię sytuacyjną do KP. Twoja tarcza pozostaje wzniesiona do początku twojej następnej tury.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).name: Efekt: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Większy)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Greater).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +4 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).name: Efekt: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Mniejszy)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +2 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).name: Efekt: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +3 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.

Effect: Resurrection Tea.name: Efekt: Resurrection Tea
Effect: Resurrection Tea.description: Reduce the DC of recovery checks by 1.

Effect: Rhino Hide Brooch.description:

Effect: Rhino Shot.name: Efekt: Rhino Shot
Effect: Rhino Shot.description: On a successful Strike, the attack deals an additional 2k6 force damage, and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If the hit with the rhino shot was a critical success, the target is knocked prone unless it critically succeeds at its save.

1.text: The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|name:Rhino Shot|traits:damaging-effect,force,conjuration,consumable,magical|showDC:all] save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

2.text: The target must critically succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|name:Rhino Shot|traits:damaging-effect,force,conjuration,consumable,magical|showDC:all] save or be knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pXV4ov0DJHzIHSEW]{Rovagug's Mud}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aMbJl8eTV3Ri5O6e]{Rovagug's Mud (Większy)}

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).name: Efekt: Rowan Rifle (Cold)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).name: Efekt: Rowan Rifle (Electricity)
Effect: Rowan Rifle (Electricity).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to electricity. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Sonic).description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to sonic. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.

Effect: Sage's Lash (Turquoise).description: Speak “clarity” to grant all affected a +2 status bonus to their next Will save for 1 minute.

Effect: Sairazul Blue.description:

You gain resistance 5 to poison damage and void damage.

Effect: Sanguine Fang - Weapon.name: Efekt: Sanguine Fang - Weapon
Effect: Sanguine Fang - Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.j392AMbPfkcRbCw6]{Sanguine Fang}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the fang, your Strikes with the weapon deal 1k4 persistent bleed damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Sanguine Fang - Weapon (Greater).name: Efekt: Sanguine Fang - Weapon (Większy)
Effect: Sanguine Fang - Weapon (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.fdntl5OOhtYIPSBi]{Sanguine Fang (Większy)}

After you cast a necromancy spell by activating the fang, your Strikes with the weapon deal 1k6 persistent bleed damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Sanguine Fang - Weapon (Major).description:
