Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Sanguine Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.se2g3LNsmQSsRv9w]{Sanguine Mutagen (Większy)}

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves. This bonus improves to +4 when you attempt a save against an effect that has the disease trait, poison trait, or would give you the Fatigued condition.

When you roll a success on a save against a disease, poison, or effect that would give you the Fatigued condition, you get a critical success instead.

Drawback Whenever you take piercing or slashing damage, you take 1k6 bleed.

Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Sanguine Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.VIHsu1q3078gdQut]{Sanguine Mutagen (Mniejszy)}

Benefit You gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves. This bonus improves to +2 when you attempt a save against an effect that has the disease trait, poison trait, or would give you the Fatigued condition.

Drawback Whenever you take piercing or slashing damage, you take 1k6 bleed.

Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Major).name: Efekt: Sanguine Mutagen (Potężny)
Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.vmwrU3lz1HFfadAS]{Sanguine Mutagen (Potężny)}

Benefit You gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves. When you roll a success on a save against a disease, poison, or effect that would give you the Fatigued condition, you get a critical success instead and your critical failures on such saves become failures instead.

Drawback Whenever you take piercing or slashing damage, you take 1k6 bleed.

Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Sanguine Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Sanguine Mutagen (Moderate).description:

Benefit You gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves. This bonus improves to +3 when you attempt a save against an effect that has the disease trait, poison trait, or would give you the Fatigued condition.

Drawback Whenever you take piercing or slashing damage, you take 1k6 bleed.

Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.name: Efekt: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb
Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb.description: As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.

Effect: Sense-Dulling Hood (Greater).name: Efekt: Sense-Dulling Hood (Większy)
Effect: Sense-Dulling Hood (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.KQfx4Ae8c3iMlwXM]{Sense-Dulling Hood (Większy)}

Effect: Sense-Dulling Hood (Lesser).name: Efekt: Sense-Dulling Hood (Mniejszy)
Effect: Sense-Dulling Hood (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YoYqtOXWo5reE2ql]{Sense-Dulling Hood (Mniejszy)}

The mask grants you a +2 item bonus to saving throws against auditory, olfactory, and visual effects. Since it dulls your senses without depriving you of them, the mask also imposes a –1 penalty to rolls and checks using Perception.

Effect: Serene Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Serene Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Serene Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Yej7lnnDYDZybGqo]{Serene Mutagen (Większy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +3 item bonus to Will saves
  • +4 item bonus to Will saves against mental effects
  • +3 item bonus to Perception checks
  • +3 item bonus to Medicine, Nature, Religion and Survival checks
  • -1 penalty to attack rolls
  • Treat Will success as critical success

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • -1 penalty to save DCs of offensive spells
  • -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack and spell damage rolls

  • -1 penalty to attack rolls

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • -1 penalty per damage die to all weapon, unarmed attack and spell damage rolls

For 1 minute, any time you make a Strike, your weapon or unarmed attack gains the benefit of the underwater weapon property rune.

Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion.name: Efekt: Shield of the Unified Legion
Effect: Shield of the Unified Legion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.PlYr5AhYwHIztMw2]{Shield of the Unified Legion}

Automatycznie aplikowane efekty:

  • gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC so long as you are within 30 feet of the shield's wielder and they have the shield raised

Effect: Shielding Salve.name: Efekt: Shielding Salve
Effect: Shielding Salve.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.EWujUs3YmlBu2jhm]{Shielding Salve}

Effect: Shining Ammunition.name: Efekt: Lśniąca Amunicja
Effect: Shining Ammunition.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NI7twU2G6UCDmvCO]{Lśniącą Amunicję}

Ta amunicja roztacza jasne światło w promieniu 20 stóp (i słabe światło w promieniu kolejnych 20 stóp) przez 10 minut. Jeśli trafi ciel, przywiera do niego, sprawiając, że roztacza on światło w identycznym promieniu. Istota może usunąć amunicję akcją Interakcji, ale sama amunicja nadal świeci przez resztę pozostałego jej czasu lub dopóki nie zostanie zniszczona.

Effect: Shining Symbol.name: Efekt: Shining Symbol
Effect: Shining Symbol.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Potężny)}

Creatures in the light receive a status penalty to Deception and Stealth checks.

Effect: Shining Symbol Weakness.name: Efekt: Shining Symbol Weakness
Effect: Shining Symbol Weakness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.YVtXlsEWb3NIkDyy]{Shining Symbol}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.M7c4uXraP05HYNXs]{Shining Symbol (Większy)}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.etnis6HOeGZEbScD]{Shining Symbol (Potężny)}

Your enemies gain weakness to spirit damage.

Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.name: Efekt: Shrine Inarizushi
Effect: Shrine Inarizushi.description: Whenever you are in exploration mode, roll a separate Search activity check with a +1 status bonus; this does not affect your Speed. If the check succeeds, a fox appears to inform you of this discovery as best as it can, although it cannot speak.

Effect: Shrinking Potion.name: Efekt: Shrinking Potion
Effect: Shrinking Potion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FqbDpztscJfM4XMe]{Shrinking Potion}

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of the shrink spell to make you and all your gear smaller.

Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater).name: Efekt: Shrinking Potion (Większy)
Effect: Shrinking Potion (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5xsfj30uXMKINxnk]{Shrinking Potion (Większy)}

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of a 4. kręgu shrink spell to make you and all your gear smaller. In addition, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while shrunken.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.name: Efekt: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated Strike)
Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Animated S.description: The target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).name: Efekt: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb)
Effect: Silkspinner's Shield (Climb).description: You animate the silkspinner's shield. Eight spider legs sprout from the shield's rim, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Silver Crescent (Greater).name: Efekt: Silver Crescent (Większy)
Effect: Silver Crescent (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XWO5pMQcYNybqWzf]{Silver Crescent (Większy)}

You shed cool, white light like a torch, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws against olfactory effects.

Effect: Silver Crescent (Lesser).description:

Effect: Silver Salve.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8fbsKEEbZ0CfBMIr]{Silver Salve}

The weapon or ammunition counts as silver instead of its normal material (such as cold iron) for any physical damage it deals.

Effect: Silvertongue Mutagen (Greater).description:

Wywoływane efekty:

  • +3 item bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation and Performance checks
  • -2 item penalty to Arcana, Crafting, Occulism and Society checks
  • Your critical failures for Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, Performance become failures instead
  • -2 item penalty to Lore checks
  • All Recall Knowledge failures are critical failure

Niezaimplementowane Efekty:

  • Become untrained in one skill you're trained in

  • -2 item penalty to Lore checks

Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater).name: Efekt: Eliksir Sceptyka (Większy)
Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SjbenbdzV4rgGxZP]{Eliksir Sceptyka (Większy)}

Czas Trwania 1 godzina

Aktywacja 1 Interakcja

Ten eliksir wyostrza umysł i pozwala przejrzeć przez kłamstwa, fałszerstwa i magiczne sztuczki. Zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +3 do testów Percepcji i ST Percepcji na rzecz rozpoznawania fałszy niezależnie od tego czy są to mówione na głos kłamstwa czy spisane matactwa. Otrzymujesz tę samą premię do rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.eHVZBmtzEcnsHSk8]{Eliksir Sceptyka (Mniejszy)}

Zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +1 do testów Percepcji i ST Percepcji na rzecz rozpoznawania fałszy niezależnie od tego czy są to mówione na głos kłamstwa czy spisane matactwa. Otrzymujesz tę samą premię do rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: Skeptic's Elixir (Moderate).description:

Zyskujesz premię przedmiotu +2 do testów Percepcji i ST Percepcji na rzecz rozpoznawania fałszy niezależnie od tego czy są to mówione na głos kłamstwa czy spisane matactwa. Otrzymujesz tę samą premię do rzutów obronnych Woli.

Effect: Skinstitch Salve.name: Efekt: Skinstitch Salve
Effect: Skinstitch Salve.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FgAPV0iLE6R1QMJ5]{Skinstitch Salve}

You gain a +2 item bonus to medicine checks and if you roll a success on Treat Wounds or Battle Medicine you get a critical success instead

Effect: Skyfang Crystal.name: Efekt: Skyfang Crystal
Effect: Skyfang Crystal.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that the marked creature generates.

Effect: Skyrider Sword.name: Efekt: Skyrider Sword
Effect: Skyrider Sword.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air for up to 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).name: Efekt: Skyrider Sword (Większy)
Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater).description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.

Effect: Slime Whip.name: Efekt: Slime Whip
Effect: Slime Whip.description: For 1 round, the slime whip deals acid damage rather than slashing damage. If the attack deals persistent damage, the persistent damage is also acid damage instead of its usual type.

Effect: Sneaky Key.name: Efekt: Sneaky Key
Effect: Sneaky Key.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.1v1OK06JxdXn6MP4]{Sneaky Key}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Thievery checks to Pick a Lock.

Effect: Soothing Toddy.name: Efekt: Soothing Toddy
Effect: Soothing Toddy.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Jgv2PAJic7LPoGQx]{Soothing Toddy}

A soothing toddy grants you a +1 item bonus to saving throws against emotion effects and against effects with a trait determined by the liquor mixed into the tea when it's created.

  • Amaretto Auditory
  • Limoncello Olfactory
  • Whiskey Visual

Effect: Soulspark Candle.name: Efekt: Soulspark Candle
Effect: Soulspark Candle.description: Worshippers of Pharasma gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, saving throws, and Perception checks. Undead creatures and worshippers of Urgathoa within this area take a –3 status penalty to those checks.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.name: Efekt: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Damage.description:
While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: The damage cannot currently be made to automatically increase as the damage dice increase.

Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.name: Efekt: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)
Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed.description:
You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.

Effect: Sparkler.name: Efekt: Sparkler
Effect: Sparkler.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hd8D1Dm6aVhMYpEL]{Sparkler}

A sparkler provides bright light in a 10-foot radius (and dim light for the next 10 feet). While the sparkler burns, you can use it as an improvised weapon, dealing 1 fire damage on a hit. On a critical hit, you cause the target to become dazzled for 1 round.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Efekt: Spiderfoot Brew (Większy)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Efekt: Spiderfoot Brew (Mniejszy)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Moderate).name: Efekt: Spiderfoot Brew (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Moderate).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.

Effect: Spined Shield Spines.name: Efekt: Spined Shield Spines
Effect: Spined Shield Spines.description: When you use the Shield Block reaction with this shield, the spines take the damage before the shield itself does. When the shield would take damage (after applying Hardness), one spine snaps off per 6 damage, reducing the damage by 6.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor.name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Armor
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AYg155apTZtebV4Z]{Spiny Lodestone}

You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks and resistance 2 to nonlethal damage.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Greater.name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Większy)
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Greater.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wnWo9t2mNV4YaH37]{Spiny Lodestone (Większy)}

You gain a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks and resistance 5 to nonlethal damage.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Major).name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Potężny)
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Armor (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aBMTXPmHg9EDe2R6]{Spiny Lodestone (Potężny)}

You gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks and resistance 10 to nonlethal damage.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon.name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AYg155apTZtebV4Z]{Spiny Lodestone}

After you cast a spell by Activating the spiny lodestone, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k4 piercing damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Greate.name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Większy)
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Greate.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.wnWo9t2mNV4YaH37]{Spiny Lodestone (Większy)}

After you cast a spell by Activating the spiny lodestone, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k6 piercing damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Major).name: Efekt: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Potężny)
Effect: Spiny Lodestone - Weapon (Major).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.aBMTXPmHg9EDe2R6]{Spiny Lodestone (Potężny)}

After you cast a spell by Activating the spiny lodestone, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1k8 piercing damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Spirit Fan.name: Efekt: Spirit Fan
Effect: Spirit Fan.description: The Spirit Fan sheds light as a torch.

Effect: Spiritsight Tea.name: Efekt: Spiritsight Tea
Effect: Spiritsight Tea.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to Seek incorporeal creatures.

Effect: Spun Cloud (Blue).name: Efekt: Spun Cloud (Blue)
Effect: Spun Cloud (Blue).description: Creatures gain resistance 5 to electricity while in the cloud.

Effect: Staff of Illumination.name: Efekt: Staff of Illumination
Effect: Staff of Illumination.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.8No84rsBOCVCkXJK]{Staff of Illumination}

The gem at the top of the staff glows as a torch, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet).

Effect: Stalk Goggles.name: Efekt: Stalk Goggles
Effect: Stalk Goggles.description: You gain all-around vision and can't be flanked.

Effect: Stalk Goggles (Greater).name: Efekt: Stalk Goggles (Większy)
Effect: Stalk Goggles (Greater).description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks involving sight and can't be flanked.

Effect: Stalk Goggles (Major).name: Efekt: Stalk Goggles (Potężny)
Effect: Stalk Goggles (Major).description: You gain a +2 item bonus to Perception checks involving sight, low-light vision, and can't be flanked.

Effect: Standard of the Primeval Howl.name: Efekt: Standard of the Primeval Howl
Effect: Standard of the Primeval Howl.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.isWSWeuJR2cYVdfi]{Standard of the Primeval Howl}

Creatures in a 20-foot emanation gain a +1 item bonus to initiative checks.

Effect: Star of Cynosure.name: Efekt: Star of Cynosure
Effect: Star of Cynosure.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against enchantment magic with the mental trait

Effect: Starsong Nectar.name: Efekt: Starsong Nectar
Effect: Starsong Nectar.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pbsrb7FMMHQBd5CO]{Starsong Nectar}

You gain a +3 status bonus to attack rolls, initiative rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks, and you aren't off-guard against undetected creatures or when flanked.

Effect: Static Snare.name: Efekt: Static Snare
Effect: Static Snare.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.66EBP5Ii9QMlZdDx]{Static Snare}

The target takes a –1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.

Effect: Statue Skin Salve.name: Efekt: Statue Skin Salve
Effect: Statue Skin Salve.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.hWXRen2x3kBxeYlh]{Statue Skin Salve}

The creature gains resistance 3 to piercing and slashing damage.

Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).name: Efekt: Stone Body Mutagen (Większy)
Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Greater).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.cqTCg6C0lvYUKQmx]{Stone Body Mutagen (Większy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -10 foot penalty to Speed
  • Resistance 10 to physical damage (except bludgeoning)

Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).name: Efekt: Stone Body Mutagen (Mniejszy)
Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Lesser).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.5ftFTiKY0BMvhzL9]{Stone Body Mutagen (Mniejszy)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -10 foot penalty to Speed
  • Resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning)

Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).name: Efekt: Stone Body Mutagen (Umiarkowany)
Effect: Stone Body Mutagen (Moderate).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.FZ6SMwiei6NnEp3e]{Stone Body Mutagen (Umiarkowany)}

Wywoływane efekty:

  • -2 penalty to Reflex saves
  • -10 foot penalty to Speed
  • Resistance 5 to physical damage (except bludgeoning)

Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).name: Efekt: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success)
Effect: Stonethroat Ammunition (Success).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.4F87PHMIzLHOUABL]{Stonethroat Ammunition}

The ammunition lodges itself loosely into the target's throat. For 1 round, the target takes a –2 status penalty to attack rolls with its jaws or fangs, and to Athletics checks.

Effect: Storm Breath.name: Efekt: Storm Breath
Effect: Storm Breath.description: You gain resistance 5 to both electricity and sonic.

Effect: Storm Chair.name: Efekt: Storm Chair
Effect: Storm Chair.description: For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take @Damage[2d6[electricity]] damage each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

Effect: Stormbreaker Fulu.name: Efekt: Stormbreaker Fulu
Effect: Stormbreaker Fulu.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NQuE19X1YMWjiWHl]{Stormbreaker Fulu}

You gain resistance 15 to cold, electricity, and sonic damage until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Strum of Thunder.name: Efekt: Strum of Thunder
Effect: Strum of Thunder.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.PGBAg9ywfdlJCoCl]{Resonant Guitar}

This item gains the thundering rune for 1 hour.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).name: Efekt: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qwCefJjr7AJSqYay]{Succubus Kiss}

The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).name: Efekt: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.qwCefJjr7AJSqYay]{Succubus Kiss}

The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects.

Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.name: Efekt: Suit of Armoire Frustration
Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.description:
On a failure, you and all creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:31] save or be overcome with frustration at how you can't follow the simple, easy-to-understand diagrams for assembling the armoire, imposing a –1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 hour.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).name: Efekt: Sulfur Bomb (Failure)
Effect: Sulfur Bomb (Failure).description: On a hit (but not a critical hit), the target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception checks and attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Swift Block Cabochon.name: Efekt: Swift Block Cabochon

Deros in the bright light shed by the Hollow Star suffer distracting but pleasant hallucinations and strange visions, and they become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} when in this illumination.

Drawback You take a –1 penalty to Perception checks and Will saves. After any round where you don't spend at least 1 action to Interact with an object, Perform, Step, or Stride, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Treat Disease (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Disease (Success).name: Efekt: Treat Disease (Success)
Effect: Treat Disease (Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of disease. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).name: Efekt: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison, but the attempt critically failed. You take a –2 circumstance penalty to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).name: Efekt: Treat Poison (Critical Success)
Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success).description: You have been treated to prevent the spread of poison. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your next save against the poison.

Effect: Treat Poison (Success).name: Efekt: Treat Poison (Success)

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a –2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.

Effect: Whispering Staff (Enemy).description: Through the staff's strange whispering, you gain a glimpse into the mind and desires of one creature you can see within 30 feet. Until the end of your next turn, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Opuszczona Garda} to you and takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against your spells.
